paper_abstract: A procedure for testing occurrance of a transient change in mean of a sequence is suggested where inside an epidemic interval the mean is a linear function of time points. Asymptotic behavior of considered trimmed maximum-type test statistics is presented. Approximate critical values are obtained using an approximation of exceedance probabilities over a high level by Gaussian fields with a locally stationary structure.
paper_title: DETECTION OF TRANSIENT CHANGE IN MEAN - A LINEAR BEHAVIOR INSIDE EPIDEMIC INTERVAL
